text: George Michael died young — but Hollywood bosses want as many as seven megastars of various ages to play the pop icon for a blockbuster biopic! RadarOnline. com has learned Ryan Gosling, Oscar winners Mel Gibson, Michael Douglas and Benicio del Toro, along with British actors Tom Hiddleston, Tom Hardy and Michael Sheen are in the running to step into Michael ’ s shoes. Eddie Redmayne and Keanu Reeves are also being considered, sources said.
